title: Going Postal
content:
Type designers who sideline for the postal service.  
 [http://www.katranpress.com/stamps\_about.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025103922/http:/www.katranpress.com/stamps_about.html "http://www.katranpress.com/stamps\_about.html")

I have been trying to find out more about unexecuted stamp designs WA Dwiggins did for the US Post Office. Anyone know more about this? [Nudge-\>Paul Shaw]

author: kegler
